## [Summary of Mixed Models as HTML Table](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/sjPlot/vignettes/tab_mixed.html)

Added Sun Dec 31st, 2020

**What is this?**

**Excerpt from site:** This vignette shows examples for using tab_model() to create HTML tables for mixed models.
Basically, tab_model() behaves in a very similar way for mixed models as for other, simple regression models, as shown in this vignette.

1.  Link to vignette here: <https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/sjPlot/vignettes/tab_mixed.html>
